-- Running vcpkg install
Detecting compiler hash for triplet x64-linux...
Compiler found: /usr/bin/c++
The following packages are already installed:
    gmp:x64-linux@6.3.0#2
    gtest:x64-linux@1.17.0#1
    mpfr:x64-linux@4.2.2
  * vcpkg-cmake:x64-linux@2024-04-23
  * vcpkg-cmake-config:x64-linux@2024-05-23
  * vcpkg-cmake-get-vars:x64-linux@2025-05-29
The package gmp can be imported via CMake FindPkgConfig module:

    #  gmp
    find_package(PkgConfig REQUIRED)
    pkg_check_modules(gmp REQUIRED IMPORTED_TARGET gmp)
    target_link_libraries(main PkgConfig::gmp)

    # gmpxx
    find_package(PkgConfig REQUIRED)
    pkg_check_modules(gmpxx REQUIRED IMPORTED_TARGET gmpxx)
    target_link_libraries(main PkgConfig::gmpxx)

The package gtest is compatible with built-in CMake targets:

    enable_testing()
    
    find_package(GTest CONFIG REQUIRED)
    target_link_libraries(main PRIVATE GTest::gtest GTest::gtest_main GTest::gmock GTest::gmock_main)
    
    add_test(AllTestsInMain main)

The package mpfr can be imported via CMake FindPkgConfig module:

    find_package(PkgConfig)
    pkg_check_modules(mpfr REQUIRED IMPORTED_TARGET mpfr)
    
    target_link_libraries(main PRIVATE PkgConfig::mpfr)

All requested installations completed successfully in: 122 us
